bpp/descriptor.name: Ortusolis
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: eMERG - A Women Entreprenuers Networking Group
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: eMERG - A Women Entreprenuers Networking Group

descriptor.name: Ortusolis
descriptor.short_desc: Networking with all the scientists of the world to bring in their latest innovations and knowledge to provide solutions to the health issues
descriptor.long_desc: Organization that empowers women entrepreneurs and professionals through training and sharing industry knowledge

descriptor.name: Charcoal Soap
descriptor.short_desc: Activated charcoal creates a super porous surface, increasing its ability to absorb matter and toxins
descriptor.long_desc: This super absorbency, plus antibacterial properties, makes activated charcoal an ideal ingredient for oily and acne prone skin types. It is used in acne products to draw out impurities, heal pimples, and prevent further breakouts. Also an anti-aging ingredient, activated charcoal is said to tighten pores and smooth the skin. It also reduces inflammation, which is significant in preventing premature aging
